Social And Cultural Activities: Dr. Ambedkar Birth Centenary Celebration Committee held at Mahow; constructed sports stadium at Indore with public partcipation; welfare of the poor people of the constituency
Special Interests: Special emphasis were given to Economic Reforms, liberalisation of Industry and its achievements
Other Information: Indian National Congress; (i) Indore District Congress (I) Committee 1991-1993; (ii) M.P. Youth Congress(I) Committee from September 1995; Madhya Pradesh Congress Committee, Bhopal
